DOC.brief_summary: The study examine efficacy single intramuscular injection betamethasone dipropionate/betamethasone sodium phosphate dose 20mg/8mg ( injection volume 4 ml ) induction therapy patient polymyalgia rheumatica . Twenty patient randomized receive injection betamethasone placebo ( isotonic NaCl solution ) immediately diagnosis . Both group receive standard-of-care steroid therapy , start 10 mg prednisone every day ( qd ) , taper 2.5 mg monthly disease active ( schedule monthly follow-up rheumatologist ) . Primary outcome measure : total cumulative dose glucocorticosteroids disease duration .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Micro-Pulse Steroid Therapy Induction Therapy Patients With Polymyalgia Rheumatica
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis polymyalgia rheumatica decompensated diabetes mellitus decompensated arterial hypertension
